name: Baffin Snow Monster Waterproof Winter Boots - Men's
description: Lightweight and technical, these boots are ready for polar expeditions or trips to the ice fishing hut. The shells keep your feet warm while letting moisture escape and stay flexible in temperatures that would crack lesser footwear. Icepaw pads on the soles reduce the odds of unplanned skating.Waterproof uppers are Timberwolf leather and Diamond-Lite insulated nylon.Removable multi-layer inner boot systems feature Thermaplush insulation.Lace-up style with top drawcords to keep snow out.Midsoles have Arctic Flex rubber bases.Waffle insoles feature anatomical footbeds.Outsoles have Baffin Icepaw technology for fantastic traction on slick surfaces.
